message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,200,000. I'm open to discussing this further. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can reach a more reasonable agreement. My counteroffer is $900,000. I look forward to your response.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer.  While I understand your perspective, the value this product brings is truly unique.  I'd be willing to come down to $1,100,000.  I believe this price point reflects its worth while still being a fair deal for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've carefully considered the value of the product and my budget. My counteroffer is $1,050,000. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
